title: Penrose's Chung on Google's Daydream VR Platform Debut (Audio)
itunes:title: Penrose's Chung on Google's Daydream VR Platform Debut (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Eugene Chung, CEO and Founder of VR film company, Penrose Studios, on the upcoming debut of Google's Daydream virtual reality service.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
